thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 08 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Genomedx Biosciences Announces Research Collaboration With Janssen Pharmaceuticals To Evaluate Decipher Classifier, Decipher Grid For Drug Development

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Genomedx Biosciences Announces Research Collaboration With Janssen Pharmaceuticals To Evaluate Decipher Classifier, Decipher Grid For Drug Development

organizations.name: brief-genomedx biosciences announces research collaboration with janssen pharmaceuticals

text:
May 8 (Reuters) - Johnson & Johnson:
* GENOMEDX BIOSCIENCES ANNOUNCES RESEARCH COLLABORATION WITH JANSSEN PHARMACEUTICALS TO EVALUATE THE DECIPHER® CLASSIFIER AND DECIPHER GRID® FOR DRUG DEVELOPMENT
* GENOMEDX BIOSCIENCES - UNDER DEAL, CO WILL TEST SAMPLES USING ITS GENOME-WIDE EXPRESSION ASSAY FROM MULTIPLE JANSSEN PROSTATE CANCER CLINICAL TRIALS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
